title: A Nunu Vu...u?
body:
When i think of champions that are a little lacking on the visual side i think {{champion:44}},{{champion:6}}, {{champion:78}} and {{champion:20}}. The first three of which are all planned to be updated (either according to rumor or outright confirmation) however i have heard nothing about Nunu. 

Nunu just looks shabby, and i feel he really needs just a Visual update ({{champion:29}}, {{champion:30}} and {{champion:12}} style.) I feel he is perfectly fine game play wise he just looks pretty outdated.

replies.body: His really annoying and the last thing I want is more people playing him. Hope he just fades into nothing like poppy.

> [{quoted}](name=SexP3ke,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9okiJvbN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-07T11:56:52.205+0000)
>
> His really annoying and the last thing I want is more people playing him. Hope he just fades into nothing like poppy.

This may shock you so be prepared but ... Poppy is getting a full rework later this year, but apparently they are removing all of her kit but the dash
He needs to look as sexy as Draven.
